name: Hotel Spinne
description: Hotel Spinne is located in the heart of the glacier village of Grindelwald at the foot of the Eiger North Wall in the Jungfrau region. Our 4* hotel comprises 44 rooms in a welcoming Alpine Chic design. Most include a balcony or terrace with superb views of our majestic mountain world. For rest and recreation, we offer guests a beautiful spa area with heated infinity outdoor pool, saunas, whirlpool, multi-sensory shower and rest room. In our Rôtisserie, Ristorante Mercato & Bistro, we serve the finest freshly-prepared pastas and pizzas, delicious meat and fish dishes.

name: Monastero di Cortona Hotel & Spa
address: Via del Salvatore snc incrocio con via Sant'Antonio, 52044, Cortona Italy
description:
Looking for a place to stay in Cortona? Then look no further than Monastero di Cortona Hotel & Spa, a romantic hotel that brings the best of Cortona to your doorstep.
Rooms at Monastero di Cortona Hotel & Spa provide air conditioning, and getting online is easy, with free internet access available.
In addition, Monastero di Cortona Hotel & Spa offers an indoor pool, which will help make your Cortona trip additionally gratifying.
Close to some of Cortona's most popular landmarks, such as Chiesa San Francesco (0.1 mi) and Duomo di Cortona (0.2 mi), Monastero di Cortona Hotel & Spa is a great destination for tourists.
During your visit, be sure to check out a popular Cortona shrimp restaurant such as Canta Napoli, which is a short distance from Monastero di Cortona Hotel & Spa.
Best of all, Monastero di Cortona Hotel & Spa makes it easy to experience many great Cortona attractions like Eremo Le Celle, Fortezza di Girifalco, and Mura etrusche, which are some popular historic sites.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Monastero di Cortona Hotel & Spa as you experience everything Cortona has to offer.

name: AMERON Luzern Hotel Flora
description: The Ameron Luzern Hotel Flora is in a prime location, 500 ft from the Chapel Bridge and 320 yards from the train station and Lake Lucerne. It has stylish rooms. You can park your car on site and reach the historic Old Town or the KKL Culture and Congress Centre within a 5-minute walk of the property. The modernly furnished rooms feature air conditioning, minibars and satellite TV. NEWS : all our Standard, Deluxe and Comfort rooms have been recently renovated and you benefit from a complimentary bottle of water as well as a coffee/tea maschine in all room types.

name: Hotel Casa Berno
description: Do you feel like you need holiday? Relax and refuel in Ascona at the beautiful Lago Maggiore! Do you want to escape from everyday stress and relax? We at Hotel Casa Berno offer the best guarantee you can have: heavenly rest and a wonderful environment. In the middle of a subtropical park and high above the city of Ascona, our four-star hotel offers you a magnificent view. Experience the breathtaking view over a fascinating mountain landscape as well as beautiful moments when the sun is glistens on the Lago Maggiore's surface. Walk through our cosy park. Bathe in the sun at the swimming pool. Refresh yourself with a cool drink on one of our panorama terrace. Enjoy the meals in our restaurant. Enjoy with all senses ...

name: Arenas Resort Victoria-Lauberhorn
description: The picture-postcard mountain village of Wengen carries Switzerland into the world. For years, an international mix of guests has found their way to the lively hotel in the best location in the car-free village, and not only because of the famous Lauberhorn ski race. In addition to the large wellness area, the main attraction in the historic building is the sun terrace with a view of the Jungfrau and the surrounding impressive mountain landscape.

name: Hotel Staubbach
description: We are a modest middle class hotel. Built in 1890 and put to a new use as a bed & breakfast; enjoy the charm of our landmark hotel in a friendly, informal atmosphere. Only an 8-10 minute walk from the train station, we are the perfect base to explore the region, close enough to enjoy the best views in town of the Staubbach falls but far enough away to stay dry.

name: Hotel Walter au Lac
description: WELCOME! The much envied position in the town centre and right on the lakeside gives the centenary HOTEL WALTER AU LAC (since 1888, 4th generation Cereda Family) a host of advantages. It is located on the lake promenade and near the traffic-free town centre. All facilities are nearby: the funicular station, car parks, the pier, the post office, banks and shops, cinemas, museums, the LAC (Lugano Arte e Cultura), the city park (Parco Ciani), the council, the Lugano Convention Centre, the Casino and the elegant via Nassa. All the 38 bedrooms are with lake view and are equipped with every comfort: bath or shower, WC, hairdryer, telephone, radio, TV, safety box, kettle, minibar, air conditioning and WiFi. Reception 24h/24. On the 5th floor panoramic terrace with jacuzzi. The breakfast-room with lake view where we serve an inviting buffet, is located on the 1st floor.

name: Chandolin Boutique Hotel
description: Located at 2000 meters above sea level, the Chandolin Boutique Hotel blends in with the authentic charm of the region. To mitigate its environmental footprint, the hotel has been carefully designed and renovated according to ecological principles. The Minergie Label, as well as the rational use of renewable energies are concrete illustrations of the commitment adopted. The Chandolin Boutique Hotel imposes a difference thanks to an interior architecture by Sandro Galloni. The property has been completely renovated in accordance with Minergie standards and is furnished with furniture designed to reflect the natural setting of Chandolin. The goal is to work with natural mountain materials that wood and stone, use the natural colors of the landscape trees and the exploiter of rustic fabrics to create harmony and balance between contemporary and traditional.

name: Chateau d'Ouchy
description: The Château d’Ouchy, a real haven of tranquillity nestled on the shores of Lake Geneva, is an unmissable destination for those looking for a stunning residence that is out of the ordinary. This charming residence houses 50 rooms, each one full of character with a fairy-tale atmosphere combined with modern comfort and conveniences, including 10 Junior Suites and three Suites with an enchanting castle tower feel.

name: Starling Hotel Lausanne
address: route Cantonale 31, Saint Sulpice, Lausanne 1025 Switzerland
description: Ideally located at the doors of Lausanne, on the EPFL Campus the Starling Hotel Lausanne welcomes you in a modern and cosy environment.

name: ibis Geneve Centre Nations Hotel
description: The Hotel ibis Geneve Centre Nations boasts a city center location, just minutes from Cornavin train station, international organizations and the Geneva International Conference Centre (CICG). It is less than 15 minutes by public transport from Geneve Cointrin international airport and the Palexpo exhibition center, and has 216 rooms with an air cooling system and free WIFI. There is a 24-hour bar and paying car park (subject to availability on arrival). Guests also enjoy free public transport and WIFI.

name: The Sun & Soul Panorama Pop-Up Hotel Solsana
description:
The Sun & Soul Panorama Pop-up Hotel Solsana is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Gstaad, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
For those interested in checking out Pedestrianised Promenade and Shopping Mile (1.8 mi) while visiting Gstaad, The Sun & Soul Panorama Pop-up Hotel Solsana is a short distance away.
The Sun & Soul Panorama Pop-up Hotel Solsana is a family-friendly hotel offering a refrigerator, a minibar, and a kitchenette in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.
Plus, guests can enjoy an indoor pool and breakfast, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Gstaad.
Gstaad has plenty of cafes. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Charly's and Restaurant Pizzeria Arc-en-ciel, which are serving up some great dishes.
Enjoy your stay in Gstaad!

name: Hotel Adler Zurich
description: Enjoy a good night's sleep at the charming Hotel Adler Zürich, a unique three-star-superior hotel, in the middle of Zurich's old town and savour Swiss specialities at the famous Swiss Chuchi Restaurant.

name: Hotel Continental Lausanne
address: place de la Gare 2, Lausanne 1003 Switzerland
description: The Hotel Continental is located in a perfect central location in Lausanne and directly opposite the main train station Lausanne. In the immediate vicinity of the hotel you will find the most famous sights of Lausanne, Lake Geneva, as well as a variety of cafés, bars and restaurants. The Lausanne Convention Center is just 20 minutes away. IDEAL LOCATION & SIGHTS LAUSANNE: - Perfectly located in Lausanne - Directly opposite Lausanne Central Station - Many cafes, restaurants and bars - old town & sights - Few steps away from Lake Geneva - Congress Center Lausanne only 20 minutes HIGHLIGHT: 1,000 m2 fitness and sauna included. PARKING: The Hotel Continental Lausanne has an agreement with Montbenon Parking. The parking is 500 meters from the hotel. Valet Parking Service - on request.

name: Placid Hotel Design & Lifestyle Zurich
description: The Placid Hotel Design & Lifestyle Zurich: perfect for cosmopolites, business travellers and leisure seekers. A hub for countless threads that converge and separate again. Urban lifestyle, modern design, authentic encounters. Though deeply rooted in the Altstetten quarter, it is still open to the world.

name: Lefay Resort & SPA Dolomiti
address: Via Alpe di Grual, 16, 38086, Pinzolo Italy
description: Lefay Resort & SPA Dolomiti stands in the ski area of Madonna di Campiglio and is located in Pinzolo, the largest town in the Rendena valley. The Resort is set in the splendid scenery of the Dolomites, declared by UNESCO a “World Heritage Site”. The entire mountain area is protected by natural parks established to conserve the extraordinary unspoiled beauty of the area.

name: B&B Agli Scaligeri
description: Agli Scaligeri B&B is an elegant and refined flat on the top floor of an apartment house located in the city center of Verona. The advantageous position offers to all its guests the possibility of a comfortable business and touristic stay. Inside the apartment, the great living room is furnished to offer a cozy and tranquil space where every guest can spend peaceful days. Agli Scaligeri B&B is made up of two luminous bedrooms (Iris and Calla), both comfortable and air conditioned with parquet pavements and furnished with great taste and research. The first bedroom, Iris has a balcony that overlooks on the rooftops of ancient Verona and looks towards the hills and Castel San Pietro. The second bedroom, Calla is decorated with antique family pieces of furniture. The great common bathroom is equipped with shower and bathtub. It makes available shampoo-shower products of the brand Filanthos, a company specialized on hypoallergenic products not tested on animals. Filianthos raw materials and ingredients are totally safe and trustable according to the European current norms. The central area where Agli Scaligeri is located, allows all its guests to visit in the proximity: Juliet’s house (290 m), Piazza dei Signori (150 m), the adjacent Piazza delle Erbe (250 m), the buildings and Scaligeri tombs (120 m), Sant’Anastasia church (180 m), Verona’s cathedral 600 m), the ancient Roman bridge Ponte Pietra and the Roman Theater (550 m), the Arena (700 m) and Castelvecchio (1.100 m) with its art gallery and much more. All this… by foot!! You are in the heart of Verona!

name: B&B Boutique Hotel Clara
address: Via in der Sandgrube 42, 39031 Riscone, Brunico Italy
description: Your special holiday home in the Dolomites. The Clara. A long-cherished dream. A place that simply invites you to be yourself. A holiday home that makes both visible and tangible who we are and what fills us with fire. Lovingly set up with an eye for the extraordinary. For what really counts in life. We call it smart luxury. Our vision of a bed & breakfast that has a little bit more to offer than you expect. The type of luxury that makes a holiday something really special - yet remains unpretentious in the process. Genuine warmth, an open ear, selected South Tyrolean quality produce on the breakfast table. This is what the Clara has to offer. A small but perfectly formed and very personally run hotel in Reischach on the Kronplatz. A very warm welcome to our home! Melanie and Roland Clara

name: Hotel David
description: Hotel David, not just a Hotel! Small and AUTHENTIC, you will immediately feel at home. Customers who choose to stay with us are not looking for formal or glossy luxury but for an environment where the authenticity of places and time for human relationships are re-evaluated. At the heart of our business there is not only the profit of the company but a real lifestyle. The vital fulcrum is people, solidarity and ecology. We try to carry on our tradition of hospitality with creativity and irony. A source of pride and a great stimulus for the future are the many awards and prizes we have received in recent years from our customers. A small historical reality in the city of Florence, which for over 60 years has welcomed travelers from all over the world with a smile!

name: Agriturismo Tetto Garrone
address: Via della Campagna 45 Fraz. Roata Rossi, 12100, Cuneo Italy
description: Tetto Garrone is an old farmhouse restored . Service as B&B. The farmhouse can offer eight double rooms with bathroom and shower. Every room is dedicated to an old fruit and its color skin is painted on some walls. Wooden roof and double height. The use ofa common kitchen with TV and internet access is included in the room rate. It's surrounded by 15 hectares cultivated with hazelnuts, walnuts and chestnuts.

name: Albatros Beach Hotel
address: Via Luigi Rizzo, 98037 Letojanni, Sicily Italy
description: Welcome to Albatros Beach Hotel, your Letojanni “home away from home.” Hotel Albatros aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year. Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning, and guests can go online with free internet access offered by the hotel. Hotel Albatros features a concierge, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts free breakfast. Letojanni has plenty of Italian restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Da Nino, Paradise Beach Club, and Golà, which are serving up some great dishes. If you’re looking for something to do, Palazzo Durante (0.2 mi), Parrocchia Di San Giuseppe (0.2 mi), and Palazzo Silipigni (0.4 mi) are a nice way to spend some time, and they are all within walking distance of Hotel Albatros. Hotel Albatros puts the best of Letojanni at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

name: Castello - Lake Front Hotel & Living Suite
description: The atmosphere is unique in our 4 Star hotel in Malcesine, which is within walking distance of the alleyways of the historical downtown. The Living Suite Hotel is situated between the crystal clear waters of Lake Garda and the ancient battlements of Castle Scaligero.

name: B&B Punta Cutieri
description: Located a few meters from the sea, along the walls of the historic center of Gallipoli, was born on b & b Punta CutieriThanks to its strategic location just a few minutes you can reacheasily the most characteristic places of the old city, being situated on its walls urbiche, but also of the village with its wide course with many shops, bars, restaurants, pizzerias and bars.All guests can use the terrace for communal use where you will be served breakfast and from which you can admire the breathtaking view of the bay from Gallipoli to enjoy unforgettable moments of relaxation

name: Torretta ai Sassi
description: Torretta Ai Sassi guesthouse is in the stunning Matera with its famous caves. It offers an extensive breakfast, elegantly modern rooms with an en suite bathroom, and many spacious panoramic terrace. All rooms feature terracotta floors and some boast wrought-iron beds. Each has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and views of the Sassi caves. Matera Cathedral is 800 metres from Torretta Ai Sassi. Some beautiful beaches are a 40-minute drive away.

name: The Street Milano Duomo, a Design Boutique Hotel
address: Via Santa Radegonda 14 Accanto alla ''Piazza Duomo'', 20121 Milan Italy
description: 10 reasons why... • 100 meters from Piazza Duomo • 24/24 reception & concierge • new opening January 2018 • only 8 suites which guarantees extra privacy for each Guest • extra amenities in each room (huge haidryer, toothbrush, shaving kit, bathrobe, slippers, scale, ''Made in Italy'' bathroom amenities...) • extra large satellite LCD TV with various foreign channels • spacious rooms (between 30 / 55 square meters) • rooftop terrace • private airport pickup, restaurant & tour reservations • discover the 10th reason by yourself by visiting us in person! The Street Milano Duomo is a 4-star design boutique hotel with 8 rooms & suites, offering exceptional experience to each Guest. And it starts right from the moment you contact us, not just when you arrive in the hotel.

name: Hotel Artemide
description: Welcome to Hotel Artemide, your 4-star hotel in downtown Rome! Just a stone's throw away from the Trevi Fountain, the Colosseum or the Spanish Steps, Artemide is right in the heart of Via Nazionale, a lively and bright street, with plenty of shops to choose from. Within walking distance of Termini Train Station and with the metro station Repubblica at just 100 metres, the Artemide Hotel is the perfect starting point for discovering the Eternal City. Free mini-bar and wi-fi connection in every room, and a fully-equipped gym are just some of the perks we offer our guests. Also, make sure not to miss the Artemís Spa to dedicate a moment for your well-being and enjoy individual or couples massages. And to complete the experience, don't miss the Ambrosia Rooftop Restaurant & Bar, on the 7th floor of the hotel, with its magnificent view over the Rome' skyline.

name: Hotel L'Arcangelo - Boutique Hotel
address: Piazza Fontana 3 Via Garibaldi 3, 74123, Taranto Italy
description: Refined and charming, it got its name from a fresco situated inside the 17th century building which has been carefully restored. The sophisticated Apulian white stone floor, the carparo stone vaults and walls, the decoration, the attention to detail and the cosy, relaxing and suggestive atmosphere which can be breathed, will certainly remain in your heart. Hotel L’Arcangelo has different types of rooms, also with terraces, from which a magnificent view of the sea, the old town, the Clock Tower, the splendid Square with its ancient Fountain and the ancient Saint Egidio Bridge can be seen. The Hotel is strategically placed, only a few metres from the train station, the regional and inter-regional bus stop, the touristic port, the merchant port and from the mooring point of the ships and ferries that offer suggestive excursions on the Gulf of Taranto. All the most important monuments of the city are nearby the Hotel, easily reached in a few minutes on foot.

name: Varese Hotel
description: In the splendid district of CASTRO PRETORIO a few steps from Termini Station, stands the Varese Hotel, completely renovated and adapted to Business and especially Leisure customers. 40 finely furnished rooms with a contemporary and fresh style. A boutique hotel where the charm of the past has left room for the modern by blending with it, creating a relaxing, clean and elegant environment without neglecting all the comforts of the 21st century. All rooms are equipped with centralized and digital air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, 32-inch Samsung LCD TV with interactive system and digital and satellite channels, safe, minibar and private bathroom where courtesy products are present inside. ZERO (Exclusive Nordic Ecolabel certified formula) and mixed silk linen refined and soft to the touch.

name: La Casa di Peppe Guest House & Villa
description: Thanks to our ideal location, set in front of the sea, La Casa Di Peppe offers breathtaking panoramic views of the Amalfi Coast. The villa is a family home that has been remodeled and transformed into a luxury Guest House with just 7 bedrooms and a maximum of 14 guests at a time in order to keep it quiet and exclusive.

name: Maeco Ortigia B&B
address: Via Saverio Landolina 5 Palazzo Francica Nava, 96100, Syracuse, Sicily Italy
description: Maecò Ortigia B&B is located in via Landolina n.5, as part of the Palazzo Francica Nava which was originally built in the 15th century in the Catalan Gothic style. Following the devastating earthquake of 1693 the building was rebuilt with some Baroque additions and used by Jesuits until it was bought by the Francica Nava family, from which it still retains the name. The renovation, completed at the beginning of 2016, followed the coherence of the original architecture with the intention being to keep alive the typical Sicilian atmosphere, and recreate a place to feel at home.

name: Hotel La Tosca
address: Via Dalmazio Birago 5, 80073, Capri, Island of Capri Italy
description: The quite and simple atmosphere and the warm hospitality are the main characteristic of this small, cozy hotel that it has been completely renovated and equipped with new comfort. From the wonderful terraces that overlook the ancient Monastery of St Giacomo, you will have an impressive view of the Faraglioni rocks and a completely relaxing holiday. Located in Capri center.Free wi fi and free use of Ipad.

name: The Dante House
description: This totally renovated, 18th century, noble home is the latest restyling project for House In Naples accommodations group. Rising above one of the most important and strategic piazzas of the city, the Dante House's 8 balconies w/ city view seem to launch you into the pulsating heart of Napoli. With 6.5mt-high wooden and frescoed ceilings, extremely spacious rooms, hand-made furnishings, retro collectibles and unique interior design, this luxury accommodation is hard to classify: somewhere between Designer Home and top-rated Hotel. There couldn't be a better location for exploring Naples than that of our apartment: The Dante House is just a 5-minute drive from the Airport, Ferry Port and Central Station, a 30-second walk to the Metro, directly within the UNESCO World Heritage Site of the Historic Center of Naples and walking distance to all the major attractions the city has to offer. A fresh, yet very professional atmosphere, mixed with quality service and attention to detail.

name: Rome Airport Inn
description: The six rooms in the Guest house are equipped with every modern confort and guarantee a welcoming and relaxing stay in Fiumcino. Every room en suite, has a double bed, air conditioning, fridge, telephone, computer socket for brodline, satellite and smart tv, shower and balcony.

name: Hotel Calimala
description: Located in the heart of the historic center of Florence, our luxurious 4-star boutique hotel is housed in the sixteenth-century Palazzo degli Angeli, well-known as the home of intellectuals. Renovations led by designer Alex Meitlis involved the use of authentic materials such as pietra serena and Tuscan marble, along with contemporary furniture, to leave the Florentine soul of the building intact. The sixteenth-century charm of the origins and the faithfully preserved stone walls blend with a modern design, the brightly colored palettes give the hotel a unique and inimitable style. The rooms and common areas are characterized by high quality prints and masterpieces by international talents: a true compendium of contemporary art, in which you will immerse yourself in every moment of your day in Florence!

name: Casa Turchetti
address: Salita Dei Gracchi 18/20, 98039, Taormina, Sicily Italy
description: Casa Turchetti owes its name to the “Maestro Turchetti” who was a great musician that first held his lesson in the house and later turned it in a very important School for Musicians in Taormina .Not far from the gourgeous panoramic “Belvedere “ square , and just upon it , the house is situated in the heart of Taormina , almost in the middle between Porta Messina and Porta Catania. In all rooms well restored it’s possible to feel the characteristic atmosphere of the late 1800’s houses.

name: Park Chalet Village
description:
Finding an ideal family-friendly hotel in Livigno does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Park Chalet Village, a nice option for travelers like you.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Livigno, Park Chalet Village is located a short distance from Chiesa di Sant'Antonio (0.5 mi) and Chiesa di San Rocco (0.9 mi).
As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and a kitchenette, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.
Guests have access to room service and a sun terrace while staying at Park Chalet Village. In addition, Park Chalet Village offers a hot tub and free breakfast, which will help make your Livigno trip additionally gratifying. And, as an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.
While visiting Livigno, you may want to try some ribs at one of the nearby restaurants, such as Bivio Bistrot or Birrificio Livigno.
If you are interested in exploring Livigno, check out a history museum, such as MUS! Museo di Livigno e Trepalle.
Park Chalet Village looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Livigno.

name: B&B Casa Camilla
description: Close to the Padova Ovest Motorway exit and 10 biking minutes far from Padua historical centre, located in a very quiet and residential neighborhood, Casa Camilla offers free private one way transfers to Padua and its main landmarks. The B&B is set in its own garden with furnished patio and free bikes are available. Wi-Fi is free. With eco-friendly, elegant, traditional interiors, the air-conditioned rooms have a flat-screen satellite TV with DVD player. They include a seating area with kettle, sofa, and soundproofed windows. A sweet and savoury breakfast including croissants, jam, and hot/cold drinks can be served in the room or on the patio. English breakfast is available on request. Padova Train Station is less than a 5-minute drive from the property, as well as the Scrovegni Chapel, Giotto's masterpiece, while the unique Prato della Valle and The Basilica of Saint Anthony are both 6 km away. An airport shuttle from/to the airports of Verona, Treviso, Venice, and Bologna is available on request.

name: Mountain Spa Resort Hotel Albion
description: The Mountain Spa Hotel Albion in the Val Gardena region of the Dolomite mountains is the ideal starting-point for your well-earned holiday, offering adventure and relaxation, as well as the chance to enjoy some shopping in the picturesque town centres in Ortisei and Castelrotto. Relax on the splendid terrace with its panoramic mountain views and enjoy the warmth of the sun and the fresh mountain air; the surroundings are a blend of modern and elegant lines, in the traditional Trentino Alto Adige style. The AVALON Wellness & Mondo Spa covers more than 2,000m2, with saunas, swimming pools with massage showers, Turkish baths and a tepidarium, the heated open-air "Alpine Sky Pool", the Kneipp Alpine hydrotherapy facility, the mountain lake for swimming and the natural spring-water fountain in the grotto. Here, you can spend unforgettable moments of relaxation while admiring a unique panoramic view. Our Alpine dishes will delight your palate, and are all carefully prepared by our Chef using fresh, local produce. Italian and traditional Alto Adige dishes offer a perfect blend of lightness and tradition. The 400m2 "Re Laurin" park and playground area, with its 8-metre high slide, will delight younger guests, while older guests can stroll more quietly in the hotel gardens. Located in the superb ski area known as "Dolomiti Superski", the Hotel Albion is ideal for Winter holidays. And in the Summer, the area offers a host of exhilarating excursions and a wide range of sports activities, from tennis to fully-equipped gyms and boules. At Alpe di Siusi and in Val Gardena, you will be tempted by a splendid 18-hole golf course, as well as facilities for riding, jogging, hang-gliding, rafting, canyoning, rock-climbing, skating, fishing and canoeing.

name: Palazzo Marziale
address: Piazza Francesco Saverio Gargiulo 2, 80067, Sorrento Italy
description: Palazzo Marziale is an historical building located just in the heart of Sorrento.Just a step from the public gardens, the lift to the port and beach and the San Francesco's Cloister.Is actually runned by owners who care for it like a "family juwel" and will make you feel like at home.This year the five very spacious rooms have been completely renovated and two restaurant will be available for our guests: the terrace restaurant, open from April to the end of October and a lounge bar/restaurant open all year round.

name: Brunet - The Dolomites Resort
address: Via Roma 30, 38054 Tonadico, Primiero San Martino di Castrozza Italy
description: It is the place of well-being, of sublime gourmet dining, of a unique sense of relaxation both for couples and families ... This is Brunet the Dolomites Resort, an exceptional hotel in Trentino, in Primiero San Martino di Castrozza, where the desire to spend a sensational holiday becomes a reality. Tressane, Park Hotel Iris and Relais Le Gemme are the three hotels that constitute a reality of trinity of pure comfort, where guests will find themselves in the centre of a multifaceted vacation experience. The unique feature of the resort is that it is a true alpine island. The three structure are even connected by an underground tunnel that converges towards the Gocce di Rugiada wellness area of over 1500 square metres. Finally, the new Sky Spa and the two restaurants complete the "artwork" of a comprehensive stay from every point of view.

name: Hotel Borgo Pantano
address: Traversa Fontana Mortella, 13 int. 4, 96100, Syracuse, Sicily Italy
description: Discover the Hotel Borgo Pantano, a 4 star hotel is just 7 miles from the center and the beaches of Syracuse, Italy. An ideal compromise between the countryside, sea and city of art, surrounded by nature, within the nature reserve “Cyane and Saline.” The Hotel Borgo Pantano is located on the site of an ancient farmhouse dating back to 1861, originally a farm property, full of orange trees, lemons, olives, has been completely refurbished in 2009. The challenging architectural recovery was personally supervised by the owners , who are committed to ensure that the charm of the structure remained intact, in full respect of its authenticity. The Hotel is spread over an area of 30,000 square meters, with the outstanding scenic pool, the charming Sicilian citrus grove and the large park with relaxation areas and reading, which guarantee every guest a pleasant privacy. Hotel Borgo Pantano offers many services A modern wellness center with sauna, whirlpool, emotional shower with aroma therapy and color therapy, plus a lovely sitting area to enjoy excellent teas. The hotel is also equipped with a bar, a splendid panoramic pool designed with a special entrance to “beach effect”; elegant restaurant with typical Sicilian cuisine, elegantly furnished rooms with different styles, rooms and suites with bath iacuzzi inotre all rooms are equipped with safe, minibar, LCD TV and free wi-if free. And even outside the hotel is surrounded by a spacious and beautifully landscaped garden planted with playground for the little ones, a multilingual reception, a multilingual library, an indoor games room with table tennis – table football – Nintendo Wii , discover more »

name: Le Eriche B&B
description: Fiammetta and Piero welcome you to the B&B Le Eriche in their little detached house just 2 km from Menaggio, a famous touristic resort in the Lake Como area. It is the ideal place for people who love the quiet and the open-air life. You can enjoy a wonderful view of the lake and of the surrounding mountains. On their arrival guests are received with a welcome cocktail.

name: Quercia Belvedere Relais
address: Viao Belvedere sopra Paerno Via Belvedere Sopra Paerno, N°7, 37011, Bardolino Italy
description: Our beloved Quercia Belvedere Relais is located on the gorgeous hills with a stunning view on Lake Garda. Pampering you during your stay with peace, privacy and wellness will be our pleasure!

name: Auditorium Rooms
description: The Auditorium Rooms Bed & Breakfast, where to enjoy a panoramic view from, is located in a 20th century building, in one of the most remarkable spot of the Amalfi Coast.It offers several amenities and is located in a strategic position: right next to the famous Auditorium, designed by the architect Oscar Niemeyer, it is only 300 meters away from the center of Ravello, the city of music.The "Auditorium Rooms" is located 300 m. from the center of the beautiful Ravello, next to the brand new Oscar Niemeyer auditorium. The rooms offer a gorgeous view overlooking the beauty of the Amalfi Coast. The house has recently been completely renovated and tastefully decorated. It is equipped with all the needed comforts and consists of two rooms with bathrooms, air conditioning, television, hair dryer and furnished terrace.

name: Albergo Punta Regina
description: The Punta Regina is a charming and romantic hotel with 18 rooms in the heart of Positano.Originally a private villa it has been carefully restored, combining original characteristic charm with the best of contemporary features.The building lies on Via Pasitea, the main street in town, and is easily accessible.Built on four levels, the Hotel has a breath-taking view of the Mediterranean waters, that has made Positano famous.While relaxing from your terrace, not only will you enjoy the sight of "Li Galli" island and the tower "Clavel", but also the many boats sailing in the blue colored waters.

name: Hotel Belvedere
address: Alessandro Volta, 37, 73026 Torre dell'Orso, Melendugno Italy
description: Built in front of the famous warning tower dating from the period of Charles V and dominating the entire bay, Hotel Belvedere offers its guests an enviable unique view for long stretches of the coast of Salento. Its position, very close to the sea, makes it a coveted destination of those who make the holidays a time of relaxation and fun. The hotel has 51 rooms divided among singles, doubles, triples and quadruples in two buildings. Each room is equipped with independent air conditioning, TV, minibar and safe. The rooms looking to the south enjoy a breathtaking view over the sea and the bay of Torre dell'Orso, with its cliffs and pine trees. Finally, our panoramic restaurant will welcome you with its specialities of sea food and traditional cuisine.

name: Palazzo Natoli Boutique Hotel
address: Via Santissimo Salvatore 6/8, 10, 90134, Palermo, Sicily Italy
description: Located in the centre of Palermo, Palazzo Natoli is an elegant modern boutique hotel. With its 11 rooms, the building has an intimate and elegant ambience, although it still preserves the feeling of a nobleman’s residence. The Hotel is located 250m far from Palermo Cathedral and the famous Quattro Canti, a crossroads that leads to the city’s historic centre and its famous markets.

name: Hotel Gardenia
address: Via Bafile IV accesso al mare, 30017, Jesolo Italy
description:
Looking for a place to stay in Jesolo? Then look no further than Hotel Gardenia, a charming hotel that brings the best of Jesolo to your doorstep.
Rooms at Hotel Gardenia offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.
A 24 hour front desk, room service, and baggage storage are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. Free breakfast will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to Hotel Gardenia, free parking is available.
Close to some of Jesolo's most popular landmarks, such as Le antiche mura di Jesolo (1.0 mi) and Piazza Mazzini (1.3 mi), Hotel Gardenia is a great destination for tourists.
While visiting Jesolo, you may want to try some oyster at one of the nearby restaurants, such as QuBe.
Looking to explore? Then look no further than The Wheel of Venice (0.6 mi) and Piazzo Drago (0.3 mi), which are some popular Jesolo attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Hotel Gardenia as you experience everything Jesolo has to offer.

name: Villa Mary Suites
description: Located in a recently renovated 19th century Mediterranean residence, Villa Mary B&B offers a peaceful and relaxing stay in the pearl of the Divine Coast, immersed in a worldly atmosphere of almost magical features, composed of intense scents, warm colors, age-old traditions and deep emotions. Welcome to Villa Mary. Welcome to Positano. Villa Mary B&B is composed of recently remodeled double bedrooms, elegantly furnished with no detail overlooked. Large and bright, each has its own bathroom with hydro-massage tub or shower, hair dryer, air conditioning/heat, in-room safe, satellite TV, and private terrace from which you can admire the enchanting Positano bay. The rooms' ample space allows for the addition of an extra bed. Breakfast is served in your room or on your private terrace between 8:00 and 10:00.

name: Trulli Holiday - Albergo Diffuso
description: In the magical landscape of trulli, in the heart of Alberobello "Trulli Holiday" offers the chance to stay in unique historical houses, carefully restored and furnished according the tradition of this town, lying on the Valle d'Itria Hills, with every comfort and refinement. "Trulli Holiday" will be glad to receive you in the living stones of Trulli, with the helpfulness and hospitality to amaze you once more.

name: Rosa Salva Hotel
address: Calle Fiubera San Marco 951, 30124 Venice Italy
description: The hotel is situated on three floors and is equipped with a lift, making each room easily accessible to people with special needs. The furnishings are classic: the walls are rich with precious fabrics that accompany a clean, essential décor in various wooden essences, with various sized wardrobes that have doors or are walk-in so as to suit each guest’s needs. The pocketed coil spring mattresses with rigid base support guarantee maximum comfort after a long day spent along the little winding streets of this enchanting lagoon city.

name: Capri Wine Hotel
address: Via Marina Grande 69, 80073, Capri, Island of Capri Italy
description: Once there was a winery where wine was made by hand.Today after many generations this cosy hotel,with a beautiful rustic wine bar on the inside, is still runned by the same family. Close to the the city center,it's a natural oasis surrounded by many hectares of gardens and orchards where you can relax night and day with a good glass of wine. This Hotel closes from November to March.

name: Auberge de la Maison
description: Auberge de la Maison is a charming hotel in the centre of Entreves, a rustic hamlet on the outskirts of Courmayeur, one of the most delightful little towns in the Alps. Entreves is a picturesque collection of houses built around the old palace which was the official residence of the nobility which once reigned over Courmayeur.Auberge de la Maison is situated in a spectacular valley at the foot of Mont Blanc (Monte Bianco), a unique location among jagged peaks, glaciers and huge rock formations, where colours range from the blue-green ice of the glaciers to the cobalt sky and the grey-brown of the rock faces.

name: Hotel Antiche Figure
address: Santa Croce, 687 Fondamenta San Simeon Piccolo, 30135 Venice Italy
description: The Hotel Antiche Figure is inside a beautiful XV century building overlooking the Grand Canal, very close to the main entrances of the city, Piazzale Roma (Bus Station, parkings and transfers to / from Marco Polo and Treviso airports), Central Trains Station (S. Lucia), Venice Shore. It's the ideal starting point to experience the atmosphere between 'calli' and 'campielli'.

name: Turin Palace Hotel
description: Historic hotel in the city centre of Turin You will be welcomed with our warm hospitality and surrounded by an atmosphere of magical elegance. Whether you are seeing the sights of the city, having a romantic couple's weekend or attending a business meeting in our 4-star hotel in the city centre of Turin, you will find a perfect setting. Located in a prestigious late-eighteenth-century structure, the recently remodelled Turin Palace Hotel has light-filled rooms furnished with style for your utmost comfort, a refreshing Spa centre for your wellness and a famous restaurant where the cuisine will surprise you with exciting flavours. We also have an indoor garage by reservation, but if you arrive by train, our 4-star hotel in Turin is close to the Porta Nuova station. We are waiting for you! Events, Lunch and reserved Dinners If you are looking for a discreet, reserved and elegant dining room for an event, a business breakfast, lunch or dinner, to celebrate an important occasion or to enjoy an evening with friends, now you can choose one of the inviting dining rooms in the Turin Palace Hotel, where you will be served with the care, passion and excitement of the cuisine of Les Petites Madeleines. For events up to 100 persons, we can offer you the Mollino Room, the Turin Palace’s party room, or, during nice weather, our splendid panoramic terrace. Locations for business meeting Put your trust in Turin Palace Hotel to choose the best location for your business meetings, corporate events and conferences. In the hotel, we can offer you six different room types that can be adapted to meet many requirements. From the scenic Mollino Room, with vaulted ceilings almost 7 metres high, to the modern and functional Macario and Farassino Rooms, which enjoy natural light from large sunny windows, we can guarantee the best solution for your business. •Independent temperature control •Flat-screen television •Free WiFi connection •Free beverages in the mini-bar •Kettle for coffee, tea and herbal tea Access to the Gym is free, not allowed for those under 16 . Access to the Spa upon payment and not allowed for those under 16 Garage upon payment

name: Hotel Davanzati
address: Via Porta Rossa N 5, 50123, Florence Italy
description: The hotel is situated in an ancient (1400) typical Florentine building, right next to the Museo of Palazzo Davanzati, in Florence historical center. After very accurate restoration, Davanzati Hotel opens its rooms once again: with original Tuscan furnishing and with all the comforts. The hotel counts 21 rooms: 14 doubles, 4 single rooms, 3 suites equipped with: Air conditioning, Minibar, Sat - TV, Built-in safe, Telephone, High speed Internet connection. Also in the lobby/reception and the breakfast room (which are hot spots with free wireless internet access), there are 2 computers for free use always connected to the web.

name: Luxury Villa Excelsior Parco
address: Via Provinciale Marina Grande 179, 80073, Capri, Island of Capri Italy
description: Two thousand years ago, an Ancient Roman residence, as testified by the column dominating the entrance to the hotel. At the start of the 20th century, a Liberty style villa, the chosen refuge of artists, intellectuals and all those looking for an exclusive hideaway. In 2006 a complete restoration and renovation transformed the building into a boutique hotel in which to experience the traditional hospitality of Capri's most elegant villas.

name: Villa Enrica Feel good Hotel
address: Via Monte Brione 1/A 1/a, 38066, Riva Del Garda Italy
description: "Villa Enrica Feel good hotel" is: ...a renovated four star S boutique hotel that is stylish, intimate and clean. It offers an oasis of calmness and luxury. ...family-run. We take care of every detail with love and professionalism to ensure your stay is a memorable one. ...located in a privileged position a few steps away from the beach.. and far from the hustle and bustle of the town centre which you can easily reach with a short walk along the lake.

name: Hotel Villa Belvedere
address: Via Bagnoli Croci, 79, 98039, Taormina, Sicily Italy
description: Hotel Villa Belvedere is a delightful and romantic boutique hotel situated at 5 minutes walking from the center of Taormina. It is an ideal hotel for couples who are looking for a charm and relaxing oasis surrounded by a lovely garden always in bloom. With an amazing view of "Baia di Naxos" and the mount Etna Villa Belvedere its a perfect location for your Sicilian holidays.

name: B&B Monte Oliveto
address: Via Domenico Burchiello 67 San Frediano - Oltrarno, 50124, Florence Italy
description: This house is not a hotel, there are no numbers on the doors, not on the rooms keys. You won't find a reception nor waiters in uniform. At Monte Oliveto you don't stay.......You Live!

name: La Casa Sul Mare
description: when you see the "MONDADORI BOOKSTORE" you have arrived. Get in the gallery and the main door is opposite the Bingo, n°32. Located on seafront in the heart of the historic centre of civitavecchia between the train station and the port, the house beach creates a perfect union between the comforts of a hotel and hospitality of a home. We have 5 rooms all equipped with air condition, tv led, free wifi and private balcony sea view. The price includes breakfast and snack/drink available all day.

name: Relais Casali della Cisterna
address: Strada vecchia alle sale 8, 28832 Belgirate Italy
description: Da ogni camera o suite che scegliate la vista e sempre la stessa...spettacolare e unica...quella del lago e del monastero di Santa Caterina del Sasso. Un soggiorno al relais Casali della Cisterna ha il fascino di una vacanza che sa d'altri tempi, quella di due edifici risalenti al XIX secolo e ristrutturati per offrire ogni comfort. Il parco secolare fa da cornice a questo splendido scenario. Le camere sono dotate di TV o smartTV a schermo piatto, aria condizionata, macchina per espresso e bollitore, minibar ed e disponibile la connessione Wi-Fi gratuita. Inoltre, per i tuoi aperitivi e le tue cene, il nostro hotel ti offre un fornitissimo bar ed enoteca e la possibilita di poter assaggiare alcune delle nostre specialita regionali quali i rinomati vini, i salumi ed i formaggi della zona, oltre a specialita italiane fatte in casa. Il tutto godendoti la vista unica del nostro lago. Il Relais Casali della Cisterna e situato a Belgirate, a due passi dalla rinomata Stresa, ma lontano dal caos. Da qui, potrai prendere il battello che porta alla scoperta delle localita piu belle del lago Maggiore. Certamente degni di visita sono le isole Borromee con i loro magnifici giardini, la Villa Pallavicino, i giardini botanici di Villa Taranto, il vicino lago d’Orta e perche no? Prendete la funivia per raggiungere la vetta del Mottarone ed ammirare la vista mozzafiato sui 7 laghi della regione. Questo e un ottimo punto di partenza per programmare la tua visita alle cantine vinicole del Piemonte e le Langhe oppure la citta d’Alba con il suo famoso tartufo o per andare a fare una bella escursione a piedi nelle nostre montagne e valli come la Val Formazza (con la cascata del Toce, la piu alta d’Europa), la Val d’Ossola, Macugnaga e l’Alpe Devero. Potrai raggiungere Belgirate anche a piedi e trovare ristoranti, bar, farmacia e la spiaggia per concederti un bagno nel lago e, se non vorrai camminare, forniamo il servizio di navetta gratuita per il centro del paese e per la spiaggia. Cosa aspetti? Questa e l’occasione giusta per venire a trovarci! Possiamo organizzare per te escursioni con guida privata, viaggi in battello, lezioni di cucina, transfer dall’aeroporto e prenotarti un tavolo in un bel ristorante con vista sul lago. A presto!

name: Casa & Natura Breviglieri
description: With its simple and elegant surroundings, featuring the natural and warm colours of honey and ivory and embellished by precious details, Bed & Breakfast Casa & Natura Breviglieri represents an authentic oasis of peace in which life assumes a health-bringing leisurely pace, tucked away in the wonderful city centre of Verona.

name: Castello delle Quattro Torra
address: Strada di Pieve Al Bozzone 36, 53100, Siena Italy
description: Our historic home, a genuine 13th century fortress, allows our guests to take a step back into history and enjoy the magical atmosphere of a medieval castle without missing out on modern amenities such as air conditioning and wi-fi and while enjoying the warm welcome of a family run Bnb.

name: Opera Relais de Charme
description: Just 100 metres from Verona Arena, the Opera Relais De Charme is a luxurious property in the city's historical centre. It offers uniquely themed, self-catering accommodation with free Wi-Fi. With designer furniture and ultra-modern interiors, the studios and apartments at the Opera Relais De Charme are inspired by famous operas. Each comes with a kitchenette, a satellite LCD TV and air conditioning. Sweet breakfast ingredients are provided directly in the apartment, including croissants and juices. Staff is always available to help with arranging restaurants, trips and tickets. The property overlooks Viale Mazzini, a popular shopping street. Juliet's Balcony, made famous by Shakespeare's play, is 400 metres away, and Verona Station is 1.8 Km from the Opera Relais.

name: Hotel La Bougainville
description: Enjoying a superb location in the picturesque historic center of Positano, only five minutes from the sea. Hotel La Bougainville is a delightful family run establishment where modern technology and contemporary furnishings have been employed so as to offer the utmost in comfort and design.The interiors of the hotel, filled with the bright colors typical of the Amalfi Coast, are stylishly simple. A number of bedrooms lead out on to their own private balcony, from where to enjoy views of the sea.

name: Hotel Margherita
description: The hospitality and friendliness of a family. A warm and friendly welcome. The terrace with swimming pool, solarium and the restaurant on the roof garden. The enchanting view of Praiano, the heart of the Amalfi Coast. Only the guests of Hotel Margherita have the privilege of living these atmospheres, beauty, comforts and services in one of the most appreciated 4 star hotels of Praiano.With free garage, free wi-fi, free shuttle to the beach...

name: Baita Montana Spa Resort
address: Via Mont Dala Nef 87, 23030, Livigno Italy
description: Hotel with a family welcome, panoramical view on Livigno, near the cable-car of the ski-area Mottolino,44 comfortable rooms,panoramical bar,restaurant which is under the direct supervision of the Santelli family,Wellness Center with swimming pool,Beauty Farm,Solarium,garden for children,kids room,free covered car park with direct access by lift to the various floors,WI-FI service in all the hotel,conference hall,ski storage room and lockers,bike deposit with small workshop,car wash.

name: Hotel Du Lac
description: Hotel du Lac in Bellagio Italy is a charming small hotel. On lake-shore 30 miles from Como and 60 miles from Milan.

name: Romantic Relais Sorrento
description:
Finding an ideal hotel in Sorrento does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Romantic Relais Sorrento, a nice option for travelers like you.
Close to some of Sorrento's most popular landmarks, such as Marina Grande - Antico Borgo Marinaro (0.9 mi) and Fondazione Sorrento (0.9 mi), Romantic Relais Sorrento is a great destination for tourists.
Rooms at Romantic Relais Sorrento provide air conditioning and a minibar, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.
In addition, while staying at Romantic Relais Sorrento guests have access to room service. You can also enjoy free breakfast. Need a place to park? Free parking is available at Romantic Relais Sorrento.
During your visit, be sure to check out a popular Sorrento tempura restaurant such as Soul & Fish Restaurant, which is a short distance from Romantic Relais Sorrento.
Sorrento is also known for some great historic sites, including Marina di Puolo, Palazzo Correale, and Piazza Andrea Veniero, which are not too far from Romantic Relais Sorrento.
Romantic Relais Sorrento looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Sorrento.

name: Cascina Giardini
address: Fraz. Ricca San Rocco Cherasca, 53 Frazione Ricca - San Rocco Cherasca, 12051, Alba Italy
description: Easygoing and cosy Family owned B&B in Alba, located on top of the hill just 6 Km from the old town. Surrounded by the UNESCO Langhe hills, the wine region of Barolo and Barbaresco, the Cheese hills, Castels Valley and the Romantic Road. Availability of standard double rooms, suites with large bedroom and apartments with kitchen. Breakfast with homemade Cakes and local specialities, homemade salami and cheeses, fresh fruits, organic vegetables and our Bio Hazelnuts. Internet wifi in every room and outside area, courtesy set, daily cleaning and large free parking are all included in the price. We offer free delivery for bikes and scooters on site, bookings of restaurants and we give help for bookings of tours and tastings so you can plan a holiday tailored to your specific needs!

name: Hotel Cristallo
address: Via Verda 3, 39036 La Villa, Badia Italy
description:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting La Villa, Hotel Cristallo is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its quaint environment and proximity to great restaurants, Hotel Cristallo makes it easy to enjoy the best of La Villa.
As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.
Guests have access to room service and a concierge while staying at Hotel Cristallo. In addition, Hotel Cristallo offers a pool and free breakfast, which will help make your La Villa trip additionally gratifying. And, as an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.
Close to Chiesa La Villa (1.5 mi), a popular La Villa landmark, Hotel Cristallo is a great destination for tourists.
Travelers looking for Italian restaurants can head to Ristorante Gourmet La Gana, Utia de Bioch, or La Bercia.
Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, Hotel Cristallo is sure to make your visit to La Villa one worth remembering.

name: Hotel Millennium
description: The enchanting Hotel Millennium is located in Locarno, directly on the shoreline of the “Lago Maggiore”, near the harbor, called “Debarcadero”, a few steps from the historical center and the “Piazza Grande”, and in the nearby are also public transport, cable car to Madonna del Sasso, Cardada, Cimetta and the train station. It is the perfect place for wonderful hiking itineraries to the mountains and to the valleys of Maggia and Verzasca. During the year, there are many events for example: the “Camelia” show, Moon and stars and the Film Festival that let the city of Locarno becoming a shiny place full of joy, fun and entertainment. Newly renovated in 2018, the Hotel Millennium offers 11 rooms and a Penthouse with a panoramic view on the lake. Our Team is welcoming you cordially to our Hotel. Dogs are allowed and appreciated.

name: Excelsior Dolomites Life Resort
address: Strada Valiares 44 Bolzano, 39030 San Vigilio, Marebbe Italy
description: As Dolomites Life Resort, we are one of the best resorts for your active and relaxing winter, hiking and biking holiday in the heart of the Dolomites. In winter with direct access to the slopes and in summer to the nature parks. Embedded in the breathtaking Dolomites, our resort sets new standards in terms of mountain experience, enjoyment and relaxation. We created an oasis of well-being which makes you feel like home, thanks to the warm hospitality and professionality of our family and employees. Our 64 De Luxe rooms and suites are furnished with high quality and natural materials and will give you the pleasure of a cosy and private atmosphere. As part of our award-winning ¾ gourmet board (rich themed breakfast, light and regional dishes for lunch, afternoon snack with freshly baked cake and gourmet menu in the evening), we will enchant you with tasty creations to enjoy in the new panoramic restaurant accompanied by live cooking sessions. Our wellness areas extend over 2.500 m² and include the new Dolomites Sky Spa with a breathtaking panorama infinity pool and different relax areas exclusively for adults, a separate wellness area for families with pools and dress-on saunas, as well as our "Castello di Dolasilla", where you can indulge in various treatments. As a member of the Belvita Leading Wellness Hotels, we are one of the most beautiful wellness hotels in South Tyrol. Just in time for the winter season 2019, we have inaugurated the Dolomites Lodge, including 16 living dreams. Lots of space and light, modern design, high-quality interior - and everywhere the scent of natural woods. If you want to experience the unique natural scenery of the largest UNESCO area in South Tyrol in an active and at the same time relaxed way, you are definitely right next to our resort. Ski In, Ski Out: In winter, you have a direct access to the slopes of the Plan de Corones and the Sellaronda. In summer, the position is ideal to start directly into the nature parks. As a group member of the Mountain Bike Holidays and the best alpine hiking hotels, mountain bikers and hiking lovers get their money's worth. To give you balance and energy we have created a rich weekly sports program with our personal trainers. Family Call is responsible for the adventure program, accompanies you and shows you the most beautiful places, tours and routes. In addition, the youngest guests can look forward to a great holiday thanks to the new Kids and Junior Club. For the summer season 2020 a unique climbing experience awaits our guests directly on the outside walls of our Dolomites Lodge with climbing route and via ferrata. 100 % recommendation on HolidayCheck, Tripadvisor Traveller's Choice Award with distinction "Best of the Best 2020", Active Hotel Award 2019 in the category mountain sports, Active Hotel Award 2020 in the category bike and 2nd place in the category "Active hotels" within the nomination "The best hotels of South Tyrol" 2020: Holidays at the Excelsior Resort are first-class! New 2021: Starting from summer 2021 our resort facade presents itself in a completely new way. Stylish design meets clean lines: simply beautiful and inviting! In addition, you will enjoy an even more excellent living ambience in the 36 restyled rooms and suites of the Residence and the Castello Excelsior.

name: Suitenhotel Parco Paradiso
address: via Marco da Carona 27 6900 Lugano Paradiso, Lugano 6900 Switzerland
description: Renovated hotel in Lugano Paradiso with lake view. 65 rooms and suites, 2 restaurants, terrace, Cuban bar, indoor panoramic pool, wellness, fitness and parking.

name: Sunstar Hotel Grindelwald
description: This holiday and spa hotel is in an outstandingly panoramic location, quiet and central but with uninterrupted views of the famous North Face of the Eiger, Wetterhorn and First. Inside, the hotel is decorated with lots of warm wood, and the spacious lobby has an open fire, creating a cosy atmosphere. The large, comfortable bedrooms with their light wooden furniture are perfect places to relax in. Those in certain categories have a balcony. The half-board "Ambiance" restaurant has picture-perfect views of the mountains, tempting you to linger and eat to your heart's content. Gourmet diners are also superbly catered for in the à-la-carte "Adlerstube" restaurant. In the spa centre, you'll find all kinds of ways to unwind: try the large swimming pool, the Finnish sauna, the Roman baths with four climate zones, the hydro-massage showers, the solarium or the rest room. The hotel also offers an attractive range of sports, from a fitness centre to aquagymnastics and aerobics.

name: Central Plaza Hotel
description: Als Hotelgast ist kein Covid19 Zertifikat («Geimpft, getestet, genesen») notwendig. Im Restaurant dürfen wir Sie nur bedienen, wenn ein Zertifikat vorliegt. Falls Sie kein Covid19-Zertifikat vorweisen können, bieten wir Ihnen gerne Room Service an. In unserem Central Garten sowie im Side Walk Café dürfen wir Sie ohne Zertifikat bedienen. Das moderne Vier-Sterne-City-Hotel erstrahlt direkt an der Limmat, neben dem Hauptbahnhof Zürich. Business-Gäste schätzen neben allen Vorzügen dieses Business-Hotels den direkten Anschluss in alle Quartiere und zum Flughafen Zürich-Kloten sowie die zwei modernen Seminarräume im Hause, mit allem Komfort und Service. Städtebummler begeistert die Nähe zur Bahnhofstrasse, der berühmtesten Shoppingmeile Zürichs, zur belebten Altstadt Niederdorf, zum Landesmuseum, zum Kunsthaus, zur Oper, dem Unispital, ETH und Universität – alles in wenigen Schritten erreichbar. Der wunderschöne Zürichsee lädt zu herrlichen Spaziergängen oder einer Schiffsrundreise ein. Das Central Plaza – das zentralste Hotel für Business und Urlaub in Zürich.

name: Hotel Krone Luzern
description: The Altstadt Hotel Krone Luzern is located in the pedestrian and cobblestone zone of Luzern. For the arrival and departure, guests with a car are allowed (also taxi) to drive in front of the hotel for unloading. Public parking garages are located nearby. The Altstadt Hotel Krone Luzern offers its guests exclusive valet parking for CHF 27.00 per night. The front desk is on duty from 06:30 until 23:00. The check in after 23:00 takes place at the Hotel des Balances, just across the square. The Altstadt Hotel Krone Luzern is not suitable for disabled guests and wheelchair users.

name: 9HOTEL PAQUIS
description:
If you’re looking for a budget friendly hotel in Geneva, look no further than 9HOTEL PAQUIS.
Nearby landmarks such as The Flower Clock (0.5 mi) and Maison Tavel (0.6 mi) make 9HOTEL PAQUIS a great place to stay when visiting Geneva.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.
The property also features a hot tub and breakfast to make your visit even more pleasant.
While visiting Geneva, you may want to try some oyster at one of the nearby restaurants, such as La buvette des Bains des Paquis, Brasserie Lipp, or Fiskebar.
Plus, during your trip, don't forget to check out an ancient ruins, such as Archeological Site at St. Pierre's Cathedral.
The staff at 9HOTEL PAQUIS looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

name: Hotel Alpenblick
description: If you’re looking for a romantic hotel in Zermatt, look no further than Alpenblick. For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Zermatt, Alpenblick is located a short distance from St. Mauritius Church Zermatt (0.2 mi) and Mountaineers' Cemetery (0.2 mi). The hotel features room service, express check-in and check-out, and a coffee shop, and you can stay connected during your stay as Alpenblick Hotel offers guests free wifi. Plus, Alpenblick Hotel offers a sauna in winter and free breakfast, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. During your visit, be sure to check out one of Zermatt's popular restaurants such as Chez Max Julen, Walliserstube Zermatt, and Snowboat, all a short distance from Alpenblick. Plus, during your trip, don’t forget to check out some of the popular historic sites, such as Kapelle Blatten "Maria Rosenkranzkönigin" and Bergführerdenkmal. The staff at Alpenblick looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

name: Hotel Le Bristol
description: Facing the majestic Gemmi Pass, the Hotel Bristol draws its vitality from the depth of Leukerbad's legendary thermal springs. A four-star haven of peace, this matchless Alpine spa offers a stimulating, sunny and revitalizing break amid breathtaking natural scenery.Regulary YOGA Retreats.

name: Bern Backpackers - Hotel Glocke
description: Our location is unbeatable! Bern Backpackers is the most centrally located hostel in Bern. Big common room with a great communal kitchen, laundry, internet, TV, free tea, free WI-Fi, fussball table etc - all available 24hrsClose to restaurants, bars, clubs museums and theatres. Our hostel is clean, safe, comfortable and well equipped which ensures your stay is a pleasant and enjoyable one.

name: Sport & Wellness Hotel Post
description: We offer in our 4-star Sports-& Wellnesshotel Post in the heart of Samnaun a fully supervised adventure holiday with versatile infrastructure: bar&more Why Not, restaurant Postli, cafe/restaurant Stammerspitze, sun terraces and outdoor bar. Let yourself be pampered and entertained you are invited to our varied activity program and the advised duty-free shopping (in total about 50 shops in Samnaun) in the middle of huge brand diversity (5% discount for hotel guests in all Hangl Stores). Enjoy the time amidst the beautiful mountains of Samnaun - during summer, the hiking and biking arena with its unique alpine flora, in winter, the largest snow sports arena in the eastern Alps "Samnaun / Ischgl" (ski back to the hotel). We invite you warmly and promise to make your vacation a memorable one. Your family Hangl

name: Motel One Zurich
description:
Looking for a place to stay in Zurich? Then look no further than Motel One Zurich, a family-friendly hotel that brings the best of Zurich to your doorstep.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.
The property also features a lounge to make your visit even more pleasant.
While staying at Motel One Zurich, visitors can check out Church of Our Lady (Fraumunster) (0.3 mi) and St. Peterskirche (0.3 mi), some of Zurich's top attractions.
Travelers looking to enjoy some gyros can head to Mythos. Otherwise, you may want to check out an Asian restaurant such as Hiltl, Miki Ramen, or Kokoro.
If you are interested in exploring Zurich, check out one of the gardens, such as Botanical Garden (Botanischer Garten) and Arboretum.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Motel One Zurich as you experience everything Zurich has to offer.

name: Warwick Geneva
description: The Warwick Geneva! The chic & elegant address in the heart of Geneva. The hotel Warwick Geneva benefits of a fantastic location in the city centre, opposite Cornavin railway station and seven minutes by train from Geneva International Airport. The hotel is a walking distance of the city's most popular attractions within the international organizations, the historical centre and many museums. Our Penthouse Rooms & Suites located on the top floor, enjoy a private terrace with stunning views of the mountains over the city and some with lake view. The bar and restaurant Teseo offer delicious and tasty options to satisfy every moment of the day. We also offer a preferred option for all types of business or private events up to 200 people. Our ambassador "William" and the entire team of the Warwick Geneva will take care of you throughout your stay. They will be happy to suggest tours and will answer all your questions.

name: Hotel Alpha
description:
See why so many travelers make Hotel Alpha their hotel of choice when visiting Lucerne. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a quiet setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
You can take advantage of some of the amenities offered by Alpha Hotel, including baggage storage and newspaper. In addition, guests can enjoy free breakfast during their visit. As an added convenience, there is street parking available to guests.
Close to some of Lucerne's most popular landmarks, such as Spreuer Bridge (0.3 mi) and Kornmarkt (0.4 mi), Hotel Alpha is a great destination for tourists.
If you’re looking for a wine bar, consider a visit to Restaurant Opus, Volver - Café Tapas Vinos, or Gardist, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Alpha Hotel.
Plus, during your trip, don’t forget to check out some of the popular monuments and statues, such as Lion Monument and LA Collection'Air Art Park in Chateau Guetsch in Lucerne.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Hotel Alpha as you experience all of the things Lucerne has to offer.

name: Hotel des Alpes
description: If you’re looking for a charming hotel in Lucerne, look no further than Hotel des Alpes. Nearby landmarks such as Kornmarkt (0.1 mi) and Jesuitenkirche (0.2 mi) make Hotel des Alpes a great place to stay when visiting Lucerne. Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Hotel des Alpes offer a flat screen TV. During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk, baggage storage, and newspaper. For travelers arriving by car, there is paid public parking available nearby. While in Lucerne, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Hotel des Alpes, including Wirtshaus Galliker (0.3 mi), STERN Luzern (0.3 mi), and Restaurant La Cucina (0.3 mi). Plus, during your trip, don't forget to check out a science museum, such as Swiss Museum of Transport. The staff at Hotel des Alpes looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

name: Hotel Butterfly
description: The Best Western Hotel Butterfly has a quiet location in the center of car-free Zermatt, a 2-minute walk from the Gornergratbahn train station and the ski bus stop.All rooms at the Butterfly hotel have satellite TV including CNN, coffee and tea-making facilities and are provide with free Wi-Fi.In the evening, you can enjoy a delicious 5-course dinner in the restaurant.The spa area features a Finnish sauna, an infrared cabin, a steam bath and a tanning bed. During the summer, the spa area is available upon request. Massages are also available upon request.

name: Hotel Silberhorn
description:
Hotel Silberhorn is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Lauterbrunnen, offering a romantic environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Minotel Lauterbrunnen offer a flat screen TV.
During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including newspaper and a sun terrace. Guests of Hotel Silberhorn are also welcome to enjoy free breakfast, located on site. For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available.
During your visit, be sure to check out one of Lauterbrunnen's popular schnitzel restaurants such as Hotel Oberland Restaurant, Swiss Restaurant Weidstuebli, and Hotel Restaurant Silberhorn, all a short distance from Hotel Silberhorn.
Best of all, Minotel Lauterbrunnen makes it easy to experience many great Lauterbrunnen attractions like Lauterbrunnen Valley Waterfalls, Trummelbach Falls, and Lauterbrunnen Village, which are some popular waterfalls.
Enjoy your stay in Lauterbrunnen!

name: H4 Hotel Arcadia Locarno
description: The H4 Hotel Arcadia is located on the lakeside promenade in Locarno, and is only separated from Lago Maggiore by the lakeside road. The boat embarkation point is in the immediate vicinity, as is the famous “Piazza Grande.” The town welcomes guests with a Mediterranean climate and a wide range of cultural, countryside and historic attractions. The family-friendly H4 Hotel Arcadia has 90 rooms as well as one and two-room apartments, all of which are equipped with a radio, cable TV, air conditioning, a minibar, an espresso machine, a seating area and a furnished balcony, as well as bathrooms with shower, a hairdryer and range of toiletries. The garden contains a pool with loungers, giving you the chance to have fun and cool off during the summer, while the rooftop terrace provides stunning, panoramic views over Lago Maggiore. Our younger guests can enjoy a play area, a video area, a playroom and a table tennis table. Bicycles are also loaned out to guests free of charge.

name: Hotel Kipling - Manotel Geneva
address: 27 rue de la Navigation, Geneva 1201 Switzerland
description: A journey of discovery. India, the Orient and beyond. With its furbishings inspired by exotic lands, the Hotel Kipling takes you to another world, a profusion of fragrances, colours and sensuality. Located in the city-center, close to the train station and the lake. You can discover several category of rooms and our complimentary services (business center, wifi). We give you also a free public transportation card during all your stay. A bar, a meeting room and a parking lot are available on site.

name: Hotel Gletschergarten
description: Almost 125 years old, the traditional family-run Hotel Gletschergarten in Grindelwald offers you panoramic mountain views, free WiFi. In good snow conditions, a ski run leads almost to the hotel. Breakfast is served every morning. After a day outside you can relax at the fireplace in the lounge. Half board, including a 4-course dinner, is available on request. A free pick-up service from the railway or bus station is offered. The Grindelwald First Cable Car Station is reachable within just a few minutes' walk, and the bus stop is just 20 metres away from the Gletschergarten Hotel. Further free time activities can be organised by the help of the staff. The hotel also has a new renovated wellness area with sauna and steam bath. You enjoy free access to the sports centre of Grindelwald, which features an indoor pool and an ice skating rink. Various tickets and ski passes can be bought at the regular rates from the reception. Wash & dry coin laundry available.

name: AMERON Davos Swiss Mountain Resort
description: Experience the perfect symbiosis of our business and wellness hotel, located in the heart of the Swiss state Graubünden, in Davos: Treat yourself with a stay in the hotel in Davos and enjoy the authentic Italian cusine in the restaurant cantinetta, the 850m² large vitality spa and of course the spacious hotel rooms in modern Swiss design. The AMERON Hotel Davos is located between Davos Platz and Davos Dorf and is situated right across the street from the Congress Center Davos. The bus stop "Davos Schiabach", serviced by lines 1, 3, 4 & 7, is only 220 meters away from the hotel and thus guarantees getting around Davos with ease. From Zurich Airport, the closest airport, the most convenient mode of transportation is by train, with which you will be in Davos within 2.5 hours. Italian joy of living meets creative Swiss cuisine: Authentic, innovative and with creative accents, but most of all typically Italian. That is the philosophy of the "cucina casalinga". The name "cantinetta" is derived from the Italian word "cantina", meaning wine cellar. They therefore offer a large selection of Italian and Swiss wines. The kitchen team, which can be observed at work in the open show kitchen, serves you every morning the varied AMERON buffet breakfast. And from noon, the daily changing lunch. For dinner you may choose from our varied à la carte menu. Always fresh and always delicious!

name: Hotel Baren am Bundesplatz
description: The 4* Hotel Bären am Bundesplatz is situated in the heart of Berne -an Unesco World Culture Heritage city. It is ideally situated next to the main railway station and close to The House of Parliament. The main shopping area and other attractions, such as the Bernese Munster, the Zytglogge and the Bear Park are all within walking distance. The hotel has 69 new renovated non-smoking rooms. All are equipped with a work place, free Wi Fi and TV (multilingual),Coffee machine, bath or shower, hairdryer, water heater and a safe. All rooms are air conditioned. A Bernese buffet breakfast with local products will be served in the open kitchen. The fitness room is available 24hours. In the Lobby guests can enjoy refreshing drinks, coffee and tea.

name: Hotel Schweizerhof St. Moritz
address: Via dal Bagn 54, St. Moritz 7500 Switzerland
description: The "Hotel Schweizerhof" is located at the very heart of St. Moritz. Open all year, with a superior ranking and it is family-owned. Our guests are seeking relaxation, they are nature and golf lovers, like to bike and hike as well as business travelers. Our 82 rooms and junior suites are modern, bright and friendly on 5 floors with a fantastic view. The seminar and banquet rooms offer contemporary comfort and feature the latest technology and equipment. Our restaurants "Acla" and "Segantini Restaurant" are the place to go for gourmets and lovers of classic, regional and italian cuisine. Good entertainment and nightlife are guaranteed at our very popular "Stübli" bar with live music. And our mountain cabin Clavadatsch provides you with a delightful view and local dishes during the day in winter and can be turned into the party location for you all year round. All our rooms are non smoking rooms. Smokers are welcome at the smoking room "Library" and the "Stübli".

name: Hilton Zurich Airport
description: The HILTON ZURICH AIRPORT is situated only 5 minutes from Zurich’s international airport and 15 minutes from downtown with its popular lakeside promenade, the old town and many cultural attractions. Direct access to the highway, the proximity to public transportation, the business district, the trade show venue and to the main event venue “Hallenstadion” makes the HILTON ZURICH AIRPORT the ideal starting point for your business or leisure trips. The hotel offers spacious modern rooms, bright top-equipped meeting and conference rooms, as well as exquisite cuisine with 180 ° panoramic view.

name: 25hours Hotel Langstrasse
description: Inspired by the contrasts between banking and the red-light district, between art and capitalism, the designer Werner Aisslinger and his team have created a self-contained microcosm in the direct vicinity of Zurich Central Station: the 25hours Hotel Langstrasse. The legendary Langstrasse is a melting pot of cultures and lifestyles. Regularly changing resident artists work in and on the hotel, ensuring a steady flow of creative input. At the heart of the hotel is the Molcho family’s NENI restaurant with its eclectic brand of eastern Mediterranean cuisine. The Cinchona Bar upholds the tradition of day drinking – with highballs & music and a wide selection of fortified wines. 170 rooms • Mini-bar • Safe • UE Boom Bluetooth speaker • Free WiFi throughout the building • Free MINI rental • Free Schindelhauer bikes • NENI Restaurant • Cinchona Bar • 1 function room • Pawn shop • Audio Tape Lounge • Gambling & Business corner • Jogging corner • Sauna & gym • Kein&Aber kiosk •

name: ALL IN ONE HOTEL INN LODGE
description: The concept: more holiday for less money. Welcome to the unique ALL IN ONE HOTEL INN LODGE. A ground-breaking hotel concept. Versatile, active, refreshingly different and located centrally. The hotel that offers attractively simple holidays without compromising on style. Stylish design and simply furnished rooms provide an inviting backdrop. The hotel has 4,000 square metres of floor space, 252 beds and 67 rooms, lounges, Bistro.Lounge.Bar, free WLAN throughout the building, multimedia highlights and various bike infrastructure and services. The INN LODGE offers ideal accommodations for all guests: From a backpacker's budget to luxury rooms. Choose between multi-bed rooms or stylish studios.
